name: qieos
description: QiEOS monorepo - unified client portal, admin control, APIs, AI, billing, and per-client public websites

scripts.dev: concurrently -n WORKER,WEB -c magenta,cyan "pnpm --filter qieos-api dev" "pnpm --filter qieos-web dev"
scripts.postbuild: pnpm build:kb && echo 'KB pages synced to Neurite'
scripts.dev:stack: concurrently -n WORKER,WEB,NEURITE -c magenta,cyan,green "pnpm --filter qieos-api dev" "pnpm --filter qieos-web dev" "pnpm --dir apps/Nuerite/Neurite start"
scripts.migrate: echo 'Run scripts/create-migrations.sql in your Supabase SQL editor'
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm --filter qieos-web build && wrangler pages deploy apps/web/dist --project-name=qieos-web
scripts.deploy:sites: echo 'Use GitHub Actions or run wrangler pages deploy for each site'
